name: Olympia - An addictive Blueberry Crumble
description:
If you fancy a blueberry vape, you should give this recipe a try
After making several experiences with various blueberry flavors, I went with this combo. Is fruity, bright, authentic. And the FA Blackcurrant just blends the fruit layer.
It wasnâ€™t easy no reach to a crumble, but Iâ€™m very happy with the final result. The TPA Pie Crust merges very well with the cookies.
The FA Nut mix is the final touch to the recipe.
Give it 5 days steep.

author: luadr

reviews.text: Just mixed this up earlier this evening, trying it fresh Im getting a really nice blueberry/blackurrant on the front end, with some milder crumble notes through out. I'm really enjoying this mix. Well done. If it lasts long enough to steep, I look forward to vaping it then as well.
